welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Michelstadt, where history and modernity intertwine. From its half-timbered houses to its rich culture, we invite you to immerse yourself and discover the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heidelberg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
